Make predictions based on a second_stage fit

Source: R/two_stage.R
predict_second_stage.Rd

Make predictions based on a second_stage fit

Usage

predict_second_stage(
  new_Z,
  new_additional_covariates = NULL,
  fit,
  output = c("raw", "probability", "class")
)

Arguments

new_Z

a new data matrix (see Z from second_stage)

new_additional_covariates

a new data matrix (see additional_covariates from second_stage)

fit

output of the function second_stage

output

string either "raw", "probability" or "class" only relevant classification tasks

Value

a vector of nrow(new_Z) + nrow(new_additional_covariates) predictions.
